TextView.android:text: This game requires two players.One player (the seeker) tries to catch the other(the hider). The seeker must get close enough to hider and then press the CATCH button to win the game. The seeker can request the hider's location a limited number of times. After using all of their location-checks, the hider can continue the game or concede. To begin a game, the seeker should press the START GAME button. The hider should press the JOIN GAME button and enter the seeker's information.
